Option Name: Efficiency Type: The efficiency type of the clothes washer.
Efficiency: The efficiency from the EnergyGuide label.
Rated Annual Consumption: The annual energy consumed, as rated, from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.
Label Electric Rate: The electricity rate from the EnergyGuide label.
Label Gas Rate: The natural gas rate from the EnergyGuide label.
Label Annual Gas Cost: The annual cost of using the system under test conditions with a natural gas water heater. Input is obtained from the EnergyGuide label.
Label Usage: The clothes washer loads per week from the EnergyGuide label.
Capacity: Volume of the washer drum. Obtained from the EnergyStar website or the manufacturer's literature.
Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the clothes washer energy and hot water usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
Location: The space type where the clothes washer is located.
